isis.stitle: CAB: 7000 AND 8000 SERIES MODELS - REMOVAL AND INSTALLATION - Front Seats

note.para: Removal procedures show passenger side; driver side procedures are the same.

step1.para: Remove bolt and outer seat belt from seat belt mounting bracket.
Remove bolt and inner seat belt from seat belt mounting bracket.
If equipped, disconnect air line at the quick disconnect connector.
Remove four nuts and washers from mounting studs.
With the aid of an assistant, lift bucket seat off mounting studs and remove.

para.emph: Use all new mounting hardware when installing seats to ensure proper torque requirements can be met.

note.para: Installation procedures show passenger side; driver side procedures are the same.

step1.para: With the aid of an assistant, install bucket seat and set in place on mounting studs ( Figure 117, Items 3 and 8).
Install four nuts and washers ( Figure 117, Item 3). Tighten nuts to 15 to 20 Lbf-ft (20 to 27 N•m).
If equipped, connect air line at the quick disconnect connector ( Figure 117, Items 1 and 2).
Install inner seat belt and secure to seat belt mounting bracket with bolt ( Figure 117, Items 4, 5, and 6). Tighten bolt to 25 to 30 Lbf-ft (34 to 41 N•m).
Install outer seat belt and secure to seat belt mounting bracket with bolt ( Figure 117, Items 5, 6, and 7). Tighten bolt to 25 to 30 Lbf-ft (34 to 41 N•m).

svcsubproc.title: Fixed Passenger and Bench Seat - Removal

figure.caption: Figure 118. Fixed Passenger and Bench Seat

note.para: Bench seat with or without toolbox removes the same.

step1.para: Remove four nuts and washers from mounting studs of fixed passenger seat.
With the aid of an assistant, lift fixed passenger seat off mounting studs and remove.
Remove four nuts and washers from mounting studs of bench seat.
Pull seat belts (not shown) through upper and lower seat.
Lift bench seat off mounting studs and remove.

svcsubproc.title: Fixed Passenger and Bench Seat - Installation

para.emph: Use all new mounting hardware when installing seats to ensure proper torque requirements can be met.

note.para: Bench seat with or without toolbox installs the same.

step1.para: With the aid of an assistant, install fixed passenger seat and set in place on mounting studs ( Figure 118, Items 2 and 5).
Install four nuts and washers ( Figure 118, Item 1). Tighten nuts to 15 to 20 Lbf-ft (20 to 27 N•m).
With the aid of an assistant, install bench seat and set in place on mounting studs ( Figure 118, Items 3 or 4 and 5).
Push seat belts through from backside of upper and lower seat and pull through to the front side.
Install four nuts and washers ( Figure 118, Item 1). Tighten nuts to 15 to 20 Lbf-ft (20 to 27 N•m).
